alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 1:03PM MST until January 07 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches, locally up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Oakesdale, Moscow, Tekoa, Plummer, Colfax, Uniontown, Genesee, Rosalia, La Crosse, Pullman, and Potlatch. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
